keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: Choose firm ripe aubergines for this recipe served with a more-ish garlic dressing.

method.text: Cut aubergines in half lengthways and score the flesh. Sprinkle with a little lemon juice and salt. Bake in oven for 20 min, uncovered.
Meanwhile, soak couscous in the boiling water. Chop up tomatoes and apricots and mix together with the parsley, almonds and salad onions. Season well.
Scoop out the flesh from the aubergines and dice before mixing with the couscous and parsley mixture. Spoon back into the aubergine shells and bake for a further 10-15 min or until cooked thoroughly.
While cooking, mix all the dressing ingredients together.
Serve the aubergines hot or cold with the dressing.

title: Fresco stuffed aubergines
